name: Patty Unterman's Potato Kugelettes
recipeYield: Twenty-four potato kugelettes, for six servings
keywords: eggs, onion, potato, kosher, side dish, spring
recipeIngredient: 1 cup grated and drained Kennebec or Idaho potatoes
2 tablespoons rendered chicken fat, plus fat to grease the muffin tins (see note)
Matzoh meal for dusting muffin tin

recipeInstructions.text: Grease a 24-cup mini-muffin tin with chicken fat and dust with matzoh meal. Place one tablespoon of filling per muffin cup and bake for 25 minutes, until golden.
